pkgmetadata.longdescription: Information Decomposition of Two-Phase Experiments // The main purpose of this package is to generate the structure of the analysis of variance (ANOVA) table of the two-phase experiments. The user only need to input the design and the relationships of the random and fixed factors using the Wilkinson-Rogers' syntax, this package can then quickly generate the structure of the ANOVA table with the coefficients of the variance components for the expected mean squares. Thus, the balanced incomplete block design and provides the efficiency factors of the fixed effects can also be studied and compared much easily.
